projects.title: Songbird
projects.description:
The app is a quiz. It is necessary to guess the bird by its singing. For each incorrect answer, the number of points for a correct answer decreases by 1. You can read more about the rules in the task.

Application features:
- Work with many custom audio players
- Generation of answer cards
- Responsive design
- Unique design

projects.title: Gem puzzle
projects.description:
15 puzzle game. My first application where an empty html file is filled with js.

Application features:
- Tiles movement animation
- Move tiles with click and drag and drop
- Keeping statistics of winners
- Only solvable tasks are allowed

projects.title: Online zoo
projects.description:
Layout of two pages of the site according to the finished layout in Figma. The work was checked using pixel perfect on 4 screen sizes. Responsive design tested on screen sizes between breakpoints.

Application features:
- Carousel on homepage
- Slider with comments on the main page
- Clicking on a comment opens a popup with it
- Selecting the donation amount on the 'Donate' page
- Responsive design

projects.title: Eldritch Horror Codejam
projects.description:
Helper for Eldritch Horror game. The application shuffles the deck according to the selected character and difficulty level.

Application features:
- Deck mixing algorithm
- Animation of flipping cards
- Unique design

projects.title: Momentum
projects.description:
An analogue of the extension of the same name for Google Chrome. In the application settings, you can change the source of photos. Some of them may be blocked in your region.

Application features:
- Custom player
- Weather widget
- Clock widget
- Ability to hide widgets
- ToDo list
- Widget with quotes
- Set screensavers from 3 sources
